name.value: Medication Process 9 3.0.0-beta - MedicationAdministration - Serve - Scenario 4.x - target CheckContent - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 4.x - KWAL Medicatiegegevens MTD Script 4
Resource.id for MedicationAdministration 1

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_script4_MTD1').id

description.value: Resource.id for MedicationAdministration 2

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_script4_MTD2_GDS').id

description.value: Resource.id for MedicationAdministration 3

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_script4_MTD3_GDS').id

description.value: Resource.id for MedicationAdministration 4

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_script4_MTD3_los').id

description.value: KWAL Medicatiegegevens MTD Script 4
Test server to serve MedicationAdministration resource(s) representing MP9 building block MedicationAdministration
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.all( $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or $this.resource.id.exists())

description.value: Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl

expression.value: Bundle.entry.where(fullUrl.exists() and resource.id.exists()).all($this.fullUrl.endsWith($this.resource.id))

description.value: Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(Coding)).all(system.exists() and code.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(CodeableConcept)) .all(coding.display.exists() or text.exists() or extension.exists())

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(Reference)).all(display.exists() or extension.where(url = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/data-absent-reason').exists() or extension.where(url = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-nullFlavor').exists())

description.value: Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(Identifier)).all((system.exists() or type.exists()) and value.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.

expression.value: Bundle.total.exists() implies (Bundle.total.toInteger() <= Bundle.entry.where(search.empty() or search.mode = 'match').count())

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.

expression.value: Bundle.link.where(relation = 'self' and url.exists()).exists()

description.value: Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.all( $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or $this.fullUrl.matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or $this.resource.id.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl

expression.value: Bundle.entry.all($this.fullUrl.endsWith($this.resource.id) or $this.fullUrl.startsWith('urn:'))

description.value: Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2020.01/FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension).

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().where($this.is(CodeableConcept)).all(coding.display.exists() or text.exists() or extension.exists())

description.value: Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 4 MedicationAdministration resource(s).

expression.value: Bundle.entry.where(resource.is(MedicationAdministration)).count() >= 4

description.value: Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains at least 5 entries. (Consists of 4 MedicationAdministration and 1 Medication resources.)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.count() >= 5

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR MedicationAdministration that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 MedicationAdministration with properties: contains a resource with identifier = MBH_300_script4_MTD1

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_script4_MTD1').count() = 1

description.value: MedicationAdministration resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(identifier.value ='MBH_300_script4_MTD1').id.exists()

description.value: Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationAdministration2'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').meta.profile.where($this = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/mp-MedicationAdministration2').exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RegistrationDateTime' with .valueDateTime

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-RegistrationDateTime').value.where($this is dateTime).exists()

description.value: Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier' with .valueIdentifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier').value.where($this is Identifier).where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .identifier with .system and .value

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').identifier.where(system and value).exists()

description.value: Contains .status 'unknown'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').status = 'unknown'

description.value: Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '18629005' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').category.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '18629005' and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .medicationReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').medication.where($this is Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').subject.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .supportingInformation with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').supportingInformation.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()

description.value: Contains .effectiveDateTime

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').effective.where($this is dateTime).exists()

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').performer.where(actor.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .request with either .reference or .identifier and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.where($this is MedicationAdministration).where(id = '${mp-MedAdm2-mp9-MBH300script4MTD1-id}').request.where((reference or identifier) and display).exists()
